sentences.en: A circular protuberance or knob like swelling, as on the horns of certain animals.
sentences.cn: 瘤,''.'节疤'. ''凸饰环状突出或节状肿起, 如在一些动物角上的突起.

sentences.en: A small protuberance or elevation, as from an organ a tissue, or a structure.
sentences.cn: 隆起物, 凸出物(器官,组织或结构上的)小隆起或凸出物.

sentences.en: Abnormal rearward curvature of the spine, resulting in protuberance of the upper back ; hunchback.
sentences.cn: 脊柱后凸,驼背脊椎不正常地向后弯曲, 导致背部上方凸出;驼背.

sentences.en: It is well cut away under the eyes and has a well developed occipital protuberance.
sentences.cn: 眼睛下方象被切去一块,后枕骨发达(突出).

sentences.en: Skull. The skull is well domed, showing a pronounced occipital protuberance.
sentences.cn: 略微圆拱, 后枕骨明显的突出.

sentences.en: The occipital protuberance was well developed.
The skull is well domed a pronounced occipital protuberance.
sentences.cn: 头骨是半球形的,枕骨凸起十分明显.

sentences.en: There is a big protuberance on the trunk.
This dinosaur is recognizable by the protuberance on the top of its head.
sentences.cn: 这种恐龙可以通过头顶的凸起进行识别。

sentences.en: This paper introduces a lug mantle and solution of bottom protuberance.
sentences.cn: 介绍一种代替深拉深的变通两体风罩结构,及底部外鼓的解决办法.

words.tran_cn: 突出的；伸出的；招人注意的
突起的；招人注意的；显著的
